title: Yamaha unveils autonomous and robot-driven motorcycles
text:
Yamaha unveils autonomous and robot-driven motorcycles   01:36 
Ready to ride? Autonomous, self-balancing, and robot-driven. Yamaha brings next-generation technology to the Consumer Electronics Show in Las Vegas. Angela Moore reports.   
Ready to ride? Autonomous, self-balancing, and robot-driven. Yamaha brings next-generation technology to the Consumer Electronics Show in Las Vegas. Angela Moore reports.  //reut.rs/2AUFYxa
